article.title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

content.summary: Any judgment or decision from a third country requiring data transfer or disclosure may only be recognized if based on an international agreement with the Union or a Member State.
conditions: Must be based on an international agreement such as a mutual legal assistance treaty.
The agreement must be in force between the requesting third country and the Union or a Member State.
Does not affect other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter.
